name: Add new Mailigen subscribers to a Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row
description: Every time a new subscriber is added to Mailigen list, Make will automatically add that subscriber to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1wPftOnAmB26kssWlKyfWyCkC1BmIxIXWl4NnKbQJgyI/edit?usp=sharing).
